files.patch:
@@ -14,2 +14,2 @@
-    - name: Cache Maven packages
-      uses: actions/cache@v1
+    - name: Cache local Maven repository
+      uses: actions/cache@v2
@@ -17,3 +17,4 @@
-        path: ~/.m2
-        key: ${{ runner.os }}-m2-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
-        restore-keys: ${{ runner.os }}-m2
+        path: ~/.m2/repository
+        key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
+        restore-keys: |
+          ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
@@ -35,2 +36,2 @@
-    - name: Cache Maven packages
-      uses: actions/cache@v1
+    - name: Cache local Maven repository
+      uses: actions/cache@v2
@@ -38,3 +39,4 @@
-        path: ~/.m2
-        key: ${{ runner.os }}-m2-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
-        restore-keys: ${{ runner.os }}-m2
+        path: ~/.m2/repository
+        key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
+        restore-keys: |
+          ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
@@ -56,2 +58,2 @@
-    - name: Cache Maven packages
-      uses: actions/cache@v1
+    - name: Cache local Maven repository
+      uses: actions/cache@v2
@@ -59,3 +61,4 @@
-        path: ~/.m2
-        key: ${{ runner.os }}-m2-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
-        restore-keys: ${{ runner.os }}-m2
+        path: ~/.m2/repository
+        key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
+        restore-keys: |
+          ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
